articles.title: WhatsApp to Start Offering Health Insurance, Micro-Pension Products in India Soon - Gadgets 360

articles.title: Advance corporate tax mop-up jumps 49 per cent to Rs 1.09 lakh crore in Q3: CBDT source - Economic Times
articles.description: The increase can primarily be attributed to the low-base last fiscal when the government had slashed corporation tax rates to a record low of 25 per cent in the Q3, leading to lower tax payout by companies.
articles.content:
